Key.Spanish: Sientes que
Key.Japanese: あなたが感じていることは次の通り

Key.Spanish: Estas sangrando
Key.Japanese: あなたは出血している

Key.Spanish: Todavia tienes pulsa
Key.Japanese: あなたはまだ脈拍がある

Key.Spanish: Estas en parada cardiaca
Key.Japanese: あなたは心停止している

Key.Original: You have stable vitals (you can wake up)
Key.English: You have stable vitals (you can wake up)
Key.Spanish: Tienes las vitales estables (Puedes despertar)
Key.Japanese: あなたのバイタルは安定している (目覚める可能性がある)

Key.Original: You don't have stable vitals (This prevents you from waking up)
Key.English: You don't have stable vitals (This prevents you from waking up)
Key.Spanish: No tienes las vitales estables (No puedes despertar)
Key.Japanese: あなたのバイタルは安定していない (目覚めることは出来ない)

Key.Original: You have epinephrine in your system (Significantly higher chance of waking up)
Key.English: You have epinephrine in your system (Significantly higher chance of waking up)
Key.Spanish: Tienes epinefrina en tu sistema (tus probabilidades de despertar aumentan)
Key.Japanese: あなたはアドレナリンを打たれている (目覚める確率が上がっている)

Key.Spanish: No hay aliados cerca
Key.Japanese: 友軍は付近に居ないようです

Key.Spanish: %1El aliado mas cercano es %2 y es medico (%3m)
Key.Japanese: %1最も近い友軍は %2 で衛生兵です (%3m)

Key.Spanish: %1El aliado mas cercano es %2 y tambien es medico
Key.Japanese: %1最も近い友軍は %2 で衛生兵です

Key.Spanish:
%1El aliado mas cercano es %2 (%3m)
El medico mas cercano es %4 (%5m)
Key.Japanese:
%1最も近い友軍は %2 です (%3m)
最も近い衛生兵は %4 です (%5m)

Key.Spanish:
%1El aliado mas cercano es %2
El medico mas cercano es %3
Key.Japanese:
%1最も近い友軍は %2 です
最も近い衛生兵は %3 です

Key.Original: %1Closest unit is %2 (%3m), but no medics nearby
Key.English: %1Closest unit is %2 (%3m), but no medics nearby
Key.Spanish: %1El aliado mas cercano es %2 (%3m), pero no hay ningun medico cerca
Key.Japanese: %1最も近い友軍は %2 です (%3m), しかし付近に衛生兵はいません

Key.Original: %1Closest unit is %2, but no medics nearby
Key.English: %1Closest unit is %2, but no medics nearby
Key.Spanish: %1El aliado mas cercano es %2, pero no hay ningun medico cerca
Key.Japanese: %1最も近い友軍は %2 です, しかし付近に衛生兵はいません

Key.Spanish: ¡Te estan ayudando!
Key.Japanese: あなたは治療を受けている!

Key.Spanish: Activar uncon info
Key.Japanese: アンコン インフォを有効化

Key.Original: Enanbles uncon to know whats going around them. Own vitals and if friendlies nearby.
Key.English: Enanbles uncon to know whats going around them. Own vitals and if friendlies nearby.
Key.Spanish: Permite que uncon sepa que pasa alrededor. Tus propias vitales y si hay aliados cerca
Key.Japanese: アンコン インフォを有効化すると気絶中に付近の友軍の有無や自分のバイタルを感じることができます。

Key.Spanish: Activar mostrar el aliado mas cercano
Key.Japanese: 付近の友軍情報表示を有効化

Key.Original: Enables showing if there is nearby friendly units
Key.English: Enables showing if there is nearby friendly units
Key.Spanish: Enables showing if there is nearby friendly units
Key.Japanese: 付近の友軍情報表示を有効化すると近くに味方がいるときにその情報を表示します

Key.Spanish: Enable showing nearest unit distance
Key.Japanese: 付近の友軍距離表示を有効化

Key.Spanish: Enable showing closest friendlies distance
Key.Japanese: 付近の友軍距離表示を有効化すると近くにいる味方までの距離を表示します

Key.Spanish: Distance for looking closest friendly
Key.Japanese: 情報表示する友軍までの距離

Key.Original: Distance in meters to find nearest friendly and medic
Key.English: Distance in meters to find nearest friendly and medic
Key.Spanish: Distance in meters to find nearest friendly and medic
Key.Japanese: 情報表示することができる友軍までの最も遠い距離範囲(メートル)

Key.Original: Text if no friendlies nearby and no vitals
Key.English: Text if no friendlies nearby and no vitals
Key.Spanish: Text if no friendlies nearby and no vitals
Key.Japanese: 友軍不在でバイタル不安定時に表示するテキスト

Key.Original: Text what is shown when player has bad vitals and no friendlies nearby
Key.English: Text what is shown when player has bad vitals and no friendlies nearby
Key.Spanish: Text what is shown when player has bad vitals and no friendlies nearby
Key.Japanese: プレイヤーの近辺に友軍が不在でかつバイタルが不安定(目覚める可能性が無い)時に表示するテキスト

Key.Original: Enable showing if player is treated
Key.English: Enable showing if player is treated
Key.Spanish: Enable showing if player is treated
Key.Japanese: プレイヤーが治療を受けたことを表示

Key.Original: Enables showing text that player is being treated
Key.English: Enables showing text that player is being treated
Key.Spanish: Enables showing text that player is being treated
Key.Japanese: プレイヤーが治療を受けていることをテキスト表示できるようにします

Key.Spanish: Update interval
Key.Japanese: 更新間隔

Key.Spanish: Time between texts update. (Seconds)
Key.Japanese: 表示テキストの更新間隔。(秒)

Key.Spanish: Enable showing Epinephrine

Key.Original: Enable showing text if player has Epinephrine in his system
Key.English: Enable showing text if player has Epinephrine in his system
Key.Spanish: Enable showing text if player has Epinephrine in his system
Enable showing bleeding

Key.Original: Enable showing text that player is bleeding
Key.English: Enable showing text that player is bleeding
Key.Spanish: Enable showing text that player is bleeding
Enable showing Cardiac arrest

Key.Original: Enable showing if player is in cardiac arrest
Key.English: Enable showing if player is in cardiac arrest
Key.Spanish: Enable showing if player is in cardiac arrest
Enable showing heart rate

Key.Original: Enable showing heart rate for player
Key.English: Enable showing heart rate for player
Key.Spanish: Enable showing heart rate for player
Enable showing stable vitals

Key.Original: Enable showing if player has stable or unstable vitals
Key.English: Enable showing if player has stable or unstable vitals
Key.Spanish: Enable showing if player has stable or unstable vitals
